description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Finally, play, record, edit, save, and playback your own song creations using your Xbox 360 drum kit or controller! All Seeing Eye Games' Drum Studio features a powerful but easy to use recording interface, hundreds of high quality drum sounds, fully animated characters and eye-popping 1080p visuals. "8.7 out of 10", Editor's Choice Award -teamxbox.com, "9 out of 10" -xblaratings.com
